sentences.en: A racing injury forced Stephen Roche to pull out.
sentences.cn: 一次比赛中的受伤使斯蒂芬·罗奇不得不退出。

sentences.en: Adhering to the new rules meant inflicting serious damage on motor racing.
sentences.cn: 遵守新的规定就意味着赛车比赛将遭受严重影响。

sentences.en: Do they realize we are racing towards complete economic collapse?
sentences.cn: 他们意识到我们的经济马上要彻底崩溃了吗？

sentences.en: His abiding passion was ocean racing, at which he scored many successes.
sentences.cn: 他一直酷爱海上赛艇，并多次在比赛中获胜。

sentences.en: I get a big kick from [ out of ] motor racing .
sentences.cn: 我觉得 赛车 很刺激.

sentences.en: I made sure I sounded calm but my mind was racing.
sentences.cn: 我确保自己听上去很镇定，但脑筋却飞快地转着。

sentences.en: In that 2.7-litre form it really was a terrific racing car.
sentences.cn: 其2.7升的车型确实是非常棒的赛车。

sentences.en: It is smoothly contoured to look like a racing car.
sentences.cn: 这辆车外形设计流畅，看起来像赛车。

sentences.en: It's very difficult being a woman in motor racing.
sentences.cn: 做一名女赛车手很不容易。

sentences.en: Mr Honda was himself a keen racing driver in his younger days.
sentences.cn: 本田先生自己年轻时就是位热衷赛车的车手。

sentences.en: Racing was halted for an hour while the track was repaired.
sentences.cn: 修理赛道时车赛中止了1个小时。

sentences.en: The days of big-time racing at Herne Hill had gone for good.
sentences.cn: 在赫恩山举行盛大赛马会的日子早已一去不复返了。

sentences.en: Two young men were racing motorcycles on the loose gravel.
sentences.cn: 两个小伙子正在松散的砾石路面上赛摩托车。

sentences.en: Williams freely admits he lives for racing.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯坦承他为赛车而活。

sentences.en: Williams is obsessive about motor racing.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯对赛车到了痴迷的程度。

words.tran_cn: 生动的；保持原味的；适于赛跑的；猥亵的
属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门弟
比速度，参加竞赛；全速行进
使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进

phrases.tran_cn: 直线加速赛；短程高速赛车；减重短程高速汽车赛；街头飚车（汽车）

trans.tran_en: designed or bred to go very fast and be used for racing

trans.tran_cn: 速度比赛，赛跑，赛马，赛车等，竞赛
